_comment_baseURL: Base URL for the target environment (must start with http:// or https://)
_comment_credentials_ref: (Optional) Path to credentials JSON file for secure authentication
_comment_retries: (Optional) Number of times to retry failed tests (0-5, default: 0)
_comment_workers: (Optional) Number of parallel workers (default: CPU cores)
_comment_report_output_dir: Directory path for test reports (must be unique per run)
_comment_projects: (Optional) Playwright projects for multi-browser testing (Chrome-only in MVP)
